articles.description: A spacious interior is obviously a prerequisite for a car to compete in this class, but we also expect an upmarket feel, sensible costs, and top-notch comfort and refinement
articles.content: The previous Kia Sorento was a hugely practical SUV with enough room for seven adults, and the latest model matches it in that respect. Indeed, its third row is far more accommodating than those of r… [+919 chars]

articles.title: Code deployed in US cyber-attack linked to suspected Russian hackers - The Guardian
articles.description: Kaspersky investigators uncover evidence that may support US claims Moscow was behind attack
articles.content: A Moscow-based cybersecurity company has reported that some of the malicious code employed against the US government in a cyber-attack last month overlaps with code previously used by suspected Russi… [+2830 chars]
